alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 6:15PM MDT until July 04 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WELD COUNTY... At 615 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Johnstown, or 11 miles southwest of Greeley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Milliken around 620 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Platteville and Gilcrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
